tool_description: Extracts HTML content from real estate listing pages with support for dynamic content loading and common anti-bot measures.

target_url.description: URL of the property listing page to scrape

user_agent.description: User agent string to use for requests

wait_for_js.description: Whether to wait for JavaScript content to load

proxy_ip.description: Proxy IP address to use for the request

headers.description: Additional HTTP headers as key:value pairs

error_messages: Invalid URL: Provide a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL starting with proper protocol.
Connection failed: Unable to establish connection to target URL. Check network connectivity.
Access blocked: Website is blocking requests. Try different user agent or proxy.
Content load timeout: JavaScript content failed to load within timeout period.
usage: Provide target_url and optionally configure user_agent, proxy_ip, and other parameters. Use wait_for_js=true for sites with dynamic content.

html_content.description: Extracted HTML content from the webpage

content_length.description: Length of extracted content in bytes
